thread.title: Chrissy Teigen died and went to heaven watching Beyoncé at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen died and went to heaven watching Beyoncé at the Grammys

author: Tricia Gilbride
title: Chrissy Teigen died and went to heaven watching Beyoncé at the Grammys
text:
Chrissy Teigen died and went to heaven watching Beyoncé at the Grammys 0 2017-02-13 04:30:49 UTC 
To die by Beyoncé , oh what a heavenly way to die. 
Chrissy Teigen had the appropriate response to watching Queen Bey and Adele sing before her eyes — floating back and forth between life and death. 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 13, 2017 
She had a pretty good view, as one does when they're in heaven. 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 13, 2017 
Fortunately, Teigen was able to recover and live to star in new reaction GIFs. Major major @Adele respects. Shit happens when you actually sing live. She was incredible. 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 13, 2017 Beyonce killed me Adele gave me life I'm confused 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 13, 2017 
And pose with Adele. 
Image: Getty Images for NARAS 
Teigen also freaked out about talking to Jennifer Lopez because she is a dedicated representative of fangirls everywhere. 
Image: lester cohen/getty 
— christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 13, 2017 
Bravo, Chrissy.
